message: You started high, I'll try to negotiate from here!
I'll meet you halfway, but I'm not giving up too much yet!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to keep some leverage!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a bit more, but I still want a fair share!
I'm starting to get desperate, but I still want a decent chunk!
I'm not backing down! I'll give you a bit more, but I still want a fair share!
I'm running out of time and money, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not going to give in now, Bob! I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
I'm getting desperate, Alice. I'll give you most of it, just please let's end this!
